pageContent: Background: Previous Commission on Cancer data from the National Cancer Data Base (NCDB) examined time trends in disease stage, treatment patterns, and survival for patients with selected cancers. The most current (1992) data for prostate cancer are described in this Communication.

metaData.source:
Focal therapy for prostate cancer: rationale and treatment opportunities
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23759249/
